Company : **TECHAVENUE INTERNATIONAL LTD (Reg. 2057777)**

We support BGP Prefix Announcement , or Soft BGP Router Announcement on own ASN.
＊ No extra charges for BGP

Hong Kong is the closed to China Mainland,  it can achieve a best connectivity via HK - China Line. As compare to our previous popular product, Cloud K, which optimized for cost, now this K+ is optimized for Performance .  We will closely monitor the latency of each tel-co, and give the most optimized configuration to the customer .

    Package : CLOUDLET K1+

    Hong Kong Windows Pure SSD VPS at $6.8 per month

    ** 1 Core Processor (E5)
    ** 512M Memory [Upgradable to 1G]
    ** 20G Pure SSD Disk Storage
    ** 1x IPv4
    ** 1x IPv6
    ** Network Speed : 100Mbps 
    ** 300G Data Transfer
    ** Line quality : Premium China Access via PCCW and China Mobile Direct 
    ** Monthly Fees : $6.8 /month
